sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaLinkedin, FaGithub, FaInstagram } from 'react-icons/fa'; export function Home() { const [backendMessage, setBackendMessage] = useState(''); const [portfolioData, setPortfolioData] = useState([]); const skillsData = [ { name: 'C++', icon: ' ', color: 'text-blue-400', description: 'Strong in object-oriented programming, data structures, and algorithm design.' }, { name: 'Network', icon: ' 🌐 ', color: 'text-green-400', description: 'Good understanding of TCP/IP, DNS, subnetting, and Wireshark analysis.' }, { name: 'Laravel', icon: ' 💻 ', color: 'text-red-400', description: 'Experience creating REST APIs, Eloquent ORM, Blade templating, and MVC architecture.' }, { name: 'Python', icon: ' 🐍 ', color: 'text-yellow-400', description: 'Comfortable in scripting, automation, Flask web apps, and data analysis with Pandas.' }, { name: 'Git', icon: ' 🐙 ', color: 'text-orange-400', description: 'Version control, branching strategies, and collaborative GitHub workflows.' }, { name: 'Database', icon: ' 🗄️ ', color: 'text-purple-400', description: 'Experienced with MySQL queries, joins, and database design principles.' }, ]; useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/message') .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => setBackendMessage(data.message)) .catch((err) => console.error('Error fetching message:', err)); fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/portfolio') .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => setPortfolioData(data)) .catch((err) => console.error('Error fetching portfolio:', err)); }, []); return (
{/* About Me */}

About Me

Hi, I’m Ricarda, an IoT and cybersecurity enthusiast with a creative mindset and passion for robotics and automation.

Backend says: {backendMessage}

{/* Core Value */}

Core Values

{[ { title: 'Leadership', icon: '👔', text: 'Capable of motivating and guiding teams toward shared goals with empathy and vision.' }, { title: 'Learning', icon: '💡', text: 'Lifelong learner who embraces challenges and thrives in dynamic environments.' }, { title: 'Criticism', icon: '🔔', text: 'Welcomes constructive feedback and uses it as a tool for continuous improvement.' }, ].map((item, i) => (

{item.title} {item.icon}

{item.text}

))}
{/* Skills */}

My Skill Set

{skillsData.map((skill, index) => (

{skill.name} {skill.icon}

{skill.description}

))}
{/* Portfolio */}

Selected Projects

{portfolioData.map((item, index) => (

Project {index + 1}

{item.description}

))}
{/* Contact */}

Let's Connect

{ e.preventDefault(); const form = e.target; const formData = { name: form.name.value, email: form.email.value, message: form.message.value, }; try { const res = await fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/contact', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify(formData), }); const result = await res.json(); alert(result.message); if (res.ok) form.reset(); } catch (error) { alert('Failed to send message'); console.error(error); } }} >
{/* Social Media */}

Find me on

LinkedIn GitHub Instagram
); }
